title: A1707 Backlight Flex Pinout
message: Hello. I'm trying to fix an A1707 display assembly with bad backlight flex cable. I could only find some videos taking about A1708 which apparently is not the same. I peeled off protective varnish from the cable to expose the traces and ran jumpers from them., but the video I found on YouTube shows 9 traces, I have 10 here and don't know exactly where to solder them on the other side. Anyone have a wiring diagram for this?

title: A1707 Backlight Flex Pinout
message: A1707 and A1708 should be the same. [URL]https://logi.wiki/index.php/A1706/A1708_TConn_Backlight_Pinout_(FlexGate)[/URL]
